actives.name: Adyah Rastogi
actives.why: I joined Theta Tau because it seemed like a great community to develop professionally in as well as meet people with the same interests as me.
actives.what: Meeting so many more people that I wouldn't have met otherwise and seeing them in my classes every day!
actives.about: I love cloudy weather, crocheting, driving around, going to the gym, and finding new music to listen to!

actives.name: Daniella Polishchuk
actives.why: TT surrounds me with an extremely warm, fun, and encouraging environment. I grown and learned so much from people I feel very close to.
actives.what: There is always going to be someone around that I am familiar with. We all have fun together and also help each other through academics and professional opportunities.
actives.about: I am an electrical engineering major with interest in math, business, and art. I love to play the piano and practice kung fu.

actives.name: Danny Shum
actives.why: To find a community of people who shared a similar experiences to me, and to help me make connections with people who could better my professional portfolio.
actives.what: The friends I have made, and the community it gives me beyond the people I met in my dorm of freshmen year.
actives.about: I love weightlifting, taking photos, making videos, and eating Dominos.

actives.name: Jacey Buchner
actives.why: Wanted to find a group of people with a good balance between social and professional life at UCSB.
actives.what: I love that everyone lifts each other up and that I can get help from more experienced actives.
actives.about: I'm a Third year CS major from the bay. Back home I like going on drives or hikes w friends, skiing, watching f1 and also started cooking!

actives.name: Kaitlyn Tom
actives.why: I joined TT to make lifelong friends and professional connections.
actives.what: I like being a part of a community.
actives.about: I enjoy listening to music from the 2000's and 2010's as well as K-pop. I also try to stay up to date with the news and politics.

actives.name: Krish Chaudhary
actives.why: I joined TT to make friends outside the dorms and expand my social network at SB, I also joined to grow professionally through networking events and advice from actives. Finally, I joined to be part of a strong community of like-minded people.
actives.what: I enjoy having the close friends I have made through the process that I see everywhere across IV and campus. We also have a great number and variety of events that I love going to.
actives.about: I am a Third year CS major. I am from the Bay looking to pursue software engineering. My hobbies include surfing, boxing, cooking, and watching movies.

actives.name: Lucas Liang
actives.why: I joined Theta Tau to meet new people in my classes
actives.what: I enjoy being able to make friends with people with similar professional and social interests
actives.about: I love to surf, workout, and watch sports

actives.name: Mia Yamagiwa
actives.why: I joined TT because I wanted to join a community of engineers with similar goals and interests as myself and grow from their friendship and mentorship.
actives.what: I enjoy that the people in TT have diverse personalities, experiences, and interests, so any engineer can find people to share common interests with.
actives.about: In my free time, I enjoy playing sports, working out, and listening to R&B/rap music.

actives.name: Monica Trinh
actives.why: I joined TT to have a network of friends who are there for me both socially and professionally.
actives.what: I love getting to know my brothers and doing fun things with them, whether that is relaxing at their house and playing smash bros or driving to Jack in the Box at 2 am when we have late night munchies.
actives.about: I love squishmallows and boba. However, I do not like boba shaped squishmallows.

actives.name: Riley Chou
actives.why: I wanted to expand my network of people who are in industry and make fun memories with cool people!
actives.what: I have made many close friends and received professional mentorship from the best people. TT helped with my social life quite a bit through the fun bonding events that we host.
actives.about: I climb rocks. I gym occasionally. I sing for funzies. I am learning how to surf.

actives.name: Andrew Thai
actives.why: I joined Theta Tau to be apart of a community of likeminded individuals that could help me grow professionally and socially. I also really enjoyed rush and talking to all the actives.
actives.what: I really enjoy the collaborative environment that Theta Tau has provided as they helped me through tough classes and gave lots of career advice. I also love bonding with actives at events we have.
actives.about: I like basketball, hanging with friends, playing video games, and exploring new music. I'm a big Jermaine Cole fan.

actives.name: Claire Pemberton
actives.why: I joined TT to meet other engineers with similar interests. I'm happy with my experience and have been able to make lots of friends while developing professionally!
actives.what: I love how supportive everyone is. It's really motivating to be around smart, talented students with diverse interests.
actives.about: I love traveling, specifically backpacking. Hoping to go to Europe or India next. I also love music, art, videography, and baking!

actives.name: Eric Ni
actives.why: I joined TT to make friends both in and outside of my major and to expand my social network.
actives.what: I love that I have people I know in all of my classes and people are always down to hang out. I've goten to explore much more of SB and Goleta after joining TT!
actives.about: In my free time, I enjoy playing video games, cooking + eating, and basking in the sun.

actives.name: Ryan He
actives.why: I joined TT to meet other engineering majors, make new friends, and receive professional assistance.
actives.what: I love that I am able to meet other majors and learn from their experiences. Pretty much in every class that I am in, I always know someone in TT taking it with me.
actives.about: In my free time, I enjoy playing tennis, going to the gym, playing video games, and hanging out with friends.

actives.name: Sophia Tran
actives.why: I joined TT to meet cool people in my + similar majors, and a huge plus has been having friends in most of my classes!
actives.what: I really love hanging out with my pledge class as well as the entire active body. It's been great to receive so much professional advice as well as being able to attend fun social events.
actives.about: I'm a semi-casual kpop and anime enjoyer, and I'm a total boba and coffee enthusiast.

actives.name: Aiden Pham
actives.why: I joined TT to find a balance in my social and professional life
actives.what: I love the people I've met and having more friends taking the same classes
actives.about: I love cooking

actives.name: Cappillen Lee
actives.why: I joined Theta Tau because the fraternity has helped expand my social and professional network. Joining the fraternity has taught me how to become more career-oriented, academically-focused, and a better buddy to my frat bros.
actives.what: I enjoy hanging out with my pledge buddies.
actives.about: I'm a computer science major who likes Star Wars, Clash of Clans and memes.

actives.name: David Wang
actives.why: I joined Theta Tau because I wanted to meet a larger community of engineers, especially outside my major, who worked hard and supported each other but also had a good time. I really admired the brotherhood that everyone seemed to have with each other and the feeling that members could depend on each other, whether it be for social or professional reasons.
actives.what: Ultimately what I enjoy most about Theta Tau is the people I've met - it's cool to have so many familiar faces around me on campus. I've gotten a lot of good advice from my fellow members and also really enjoyed the events we've had together, especially those with my pledge class
actives.about: Within computer science, some of the topics I'm interested in are machine learning and big data. In my free time, I enjoy going to the gym, rock climbing, playing Apex Legends, watching anime, and reading fantasy novels. If I had to pick a favorite food, it'd probably be sushi ðŸ˜›

actives.name: Elaine Ho
actives.why: I joined TT to meet more engineering majors and make friends in my classes!
actives.what: I love how willing TT actives are to help with classes and advice in general.
actives.about: Outside of school, I love to shoot film photography, crochet, and collect smiskis and sonny angels. I also love to play video games and listen to music :DDD

actives.name: Gretchen Lam
actives.why: I joined because a lot of my friends did, but I stayed because of the power of friendship and brotherhood.
actives.what: I really enjoy the feeling of friendship and brotherhood coursing through my veins.
actives.about: I'm a professional Pokemon Unite player, and I will be the next Charlie Damielo

actives.name: Jessica Lu
actives.why: I joined TT to learn how to have a good social and academic balance in life and meet other cool COE people.
actives.what: I love hanging out with my pbros and how many close friends I've made in TT, its definitely been a great way for me to meet other people I would've otherwise never talked to.
actives.about: I love cooking for others, eating and food.

actives.name: Jennifer Zhu
actives.why: I join TT to find a community of people in engineering that shared the same interest in professionally and socially with me
actives.what: I enjoy TT because I find a sense of belonging with the actives and I got a lot of professional help and advice from people in the community
actives.about: In my spare time, I love to do activities that express creativity like drawing and photography. I also love grabbing 7 dollars coffee

actives.name: Wesley Truong
actives.why: I wanted to make more friends who I could enjoy hanging out with but also study with and take classes together
actives.what: In TT I found
actives.about: I love video games, gym, movies, basketball, skateboarding, and making people laugh

actives.name: Willy Li
actives.why: I wanted to be friends with more UCSB engineers and expand my professional networking
actives.what: Making lifelong friends and actually have the opportunity to bond with them deeply. Everyone is easygoing and very helpful!
actives.about: I love to play and watch sports, especially football, baseball, and basketball. I also like to play the guitar and travel

actives.name: Winbert Zhang
actives.why: I joined Theta Tau to connect with fellow engineers who share similar personal and professional interests.
actives.what: I enjoy the strong sense of community that Theta Tau provides and the amount of support and collaboration through classes and career advice.
actives.about: I like playing video games, exploring the outdoors, and discovering new music

actives.name: Yoana Hui
actives.why: To meet more people in engineering.
actives.what: Spontaneous hang out with the MUs!
actives.about: I like watching movies, exploring new musics (r&b is my fav!) and dance.
